title: Is learning how to read and write for adults? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Is learning how to read and write for adults?” is not a complete question. Using “is” (the present tense first-person and third-person singular of the verb “to be”) as a linking verb requires a subject complement. The question should read “Is learning how to read and write for adults ______________ (difficult, easy, possible, fun etc)?” Without that blank being filled in, it is not possible to answer this Quora question.
